com.libelium.mysignalsconnectkit

Class BluetoothManagerHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.libelium.mysignalsconnectkit.BluetoothManagerHelper

  • public class BluetoothManagerHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles the search and connection for MySignals, you can Find, connect and bond a MySignal device.

      • startLEScan

        public void startLEScan(boolean enable)
        This method scans nearby bluetooth devices, it has a timeout of 60 seconds, the results are given on public void onListDevicesFound(ArrayList devices) from BluetoothManagerHelperCallback.
        Parameters:
        enable - Set enable to true if you wan to start scanning, set to false to stop scanning

      • stopLeScan

        public void stopLeScan()
        Stops current scanning acton. This method turn off the scanning process to look for nearby bluetooth devices.
